metadata.name: Simple Validation Tests
metadata.description: Basic validation tests for the simplified honeypot architecture
metadata.author: Babayaga Team

items.title: Log Simple Action
items.description: Test that the agent can log a simple action with appropriate context
items.instructions: Use the test_log_action tool to log an informational message saying 'Starting validation tests' with any relevant context data.
items.expectedOutcome: Action is logged successfully with proper timestamp and context
verificationCriteria: test_log_action tool call must be recorded

items.title: Record Tool Usage
items.description: Test that the agent can record tool usage with timing and success information
items.instructions: Use the test_record_tool tool to record a hypothetical tool call. Use toolName='example_tool', parameters={'test': true}, response={'success': true}, duration=150, success=true.
items.expectedOutcome: Tool call is recorded with all required information and assigned a unique ID
verificationCriteria: Tool call must be assigned a unique ID
All required fields must be present

items.title: Complete Test Successfully
items.description: Test that the agent can complete a test item with proper results and evidence quality assessment
items.instructions: Use the test_complete tool to mark this test as passed. Provide comments explaining what was accomplished, set evidenceQuality to 0.9, and include any validation issues encountered.
items.expectedOutcome: Test is marked as completed with high evidence quality and appropriate comments
verificationCriteria: Evidence quality must be between 0.8 and 1.0
Comments must be descriptive and relevant
Auto-validation should run and provide confidence score

items.title: Handle Test Failure
items.description: Test that the agent can properly handle and report test failures
items.instructions: This test is designed to be challenging. Attempt to use test_record_tool with invalid parameters (missing required fields), then use test_complete to mark this test as failed with appropriate comments about what went wrong.
items.expectedOutcome: Agent handles the failure gracefully and reports it accurately
verificationCriteria: Agent must attempt the invalid tool call
test_complete must be called with passed=false
Comments must explain the failure reason
Evidence quality should reflect the partial completion
